1ec30dc9-5a04-4933-88e5-87210161b802: Reinforce {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Shields{/g} has a 50% chance to reinforce one additional random void {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}shield sector{/g}.
231c2f9f-5bf5-4191-970b-518a778c1019:
When approaching an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} shuts down non-essential systems and starts to drift, unnoticed, past enemy ships.
As a result, in most encounters, larger enemy vessels (frigates and larger) are surprised and act later.
2750abde-69b9-499e-a929-e77226ae41ce: +5% to critical hit chance against chaos enemies
383b91c8-9dc6-49a4-939f-c9f759100b2e: +5% to critical hit chance against xenos enemies
41bff973-05fe-4ef8-9be1-7c0cff6113a9: During Vulnerability Scan, the weak point never appears at the opposite side of an enemy voidship. Also, there is an additional +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the scanned weak point.
48a452ce-efb1-4764-bc95-4ab4b68c194f: Enemy voidships suffer ((from 25 to 35)% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g}) warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} when being jumped through using Shallow Jump.
5ac4ee08-6056-4350-bb1b-e8c66093df30: Restart {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Shields{/g} now inflicts only −2 {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} reduction and no {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g} penalty.
65966fc3-e9fe-46fe-9486-d1d0aeb0126e: Voidship Ram can be used at any phase except acceleration and its maximum possible distance is increased by +2.
68b7e72b-5c50-42b5-8a3a-84dc9d1b1e97: The Strafe ability can be used to ram enemy ships at 80% {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the regular Voidship Ram ability and without the bonus damage from distance travelled.
6a2d6395-c83f-4e75-a6db-7b92de29e940: Expeditious Reload will also reload the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g}. However, that weapon will suffer a −25% extra penalty to hit chance when shooting.
7b748365-ba75-41c8-9db6-2c6a7a4578fc: Torpedo Control can be used the same turn a torpedo is launched.
7d4a62f6-b0c6-4acd-bff0-b949ca2b7c0e: Expeditious Reload can be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g} to reload {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}torpedo tubes{/g} fired the previous round.
8d3e25b2-720f-446f-a1a6-98055d92fea4:
Over its centuries-old history, the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} of the von Valancius dynasty has undergone many modifications.
Learn new combat manoeuvres, develop officer posts, and improve flagship abilities at every rank to dominate the void in the Expanse.
8face57b-48e8-4a7b-a020-588a4e784e71: Voidship Ram deals twice the additional {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each extra tile travelled.
ab458176-6fff-4a11-9f39-191f7757ad6c: Cooldown of Focused Efforts is reduced by −1.
af264d13-0ae5-43f8-90f6-d67a5a170c93: By the end of Swing Run the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} can choose its position out of 3 directions instead of taking the opposite one.
b9a7d75c-c3e8-4429-8ce5-3b55e727ee62: Arc Augury gains +1 range and lasts for 2 weapon attacks instead of just 1.
cb7a47d1-e5ae-4e3f-a14f-b1d1c45a6f15: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} now collects +10% more {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from destroyed ships.
d1db8ed2-17dd-4ec1-89de-3f2d8b84b9e0: When using {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} abilities, there is a 50% chance its cooldown will be 1 round shorter.
d2afb429-193e-44b1-b214-fd7361986206: +5% to critical hit chance against pirates
d4811621-3baa-4145-8096-070898847411: New Heading cooldown is reduced by −1 round.
e14ae38a-5ce0-4dba-b7af-174dece0f23f: Shield Pulse gains +1 range. Additionally, it does not expend the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}.
f6abcc8e-7e23-41dd-9f77-c6ab0f7f85ca: Silent Running now makes the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} act before all enemies in most encounters.
fa6f2b8f-4bfc-4e4e-ae8b-18720954faf4: When using {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} abilities, there is a 20% chance its cooldown will be 1 round shorter.
